grins
Class GRiNSToolkit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--grins.GRiNSToolkit
public class GRiNSToolkit
extends java.lang.Object

The entry point to the GRiNS package. You use the factory method createDocument(String filenameOrUrl) or createDocument(String filenameOrUrl, String license) of a GRiNSToolkit to create a SMILDocument. To use the first version of createDocument you must set GRiNS Player license using the method setLicense(String license) before the createDocument call.
